item.title: The Death of Unity Web Player
item.description: We had ought to embrace, as Unity has, WebGL. They are putting the resources behind it & have it running at only ~1.5 times slower than native code. All the major browsers are expected to support WebGL and now end users will not have to be bothered with having to download a plugin.
